name: Blog Post Writer
description: Generate SEO-optimized blog posts with customizable tone and style. Includes structured output with title, content, and meta description.
use_cases: Draft content for review and editing

config.prompt:
Write a blog post about: {{input.topic}}

Target audience: {{input.audience}}
Tone: {{input.tone}}
Word count: approximately {{input.word_count}} words

Please structure your response as:

## Title
[SEO-optimized title]

## Meta Description
[155 character meta description for SEO]

## Content
[The full blog post with proper headings and formatting]
config.system_prompt: You are an expert content writer and SEO specialist. Write engaging, informative blog posts that rank well in search engines. Use clear headings, short paragraphs, and include relevant keywords naturally. Always provide actionable insights for readers.

topic.description: The main topic for the blog post

example_input.keywords: remote work, productivity, work-life balance, digital nomad
